channel.title: [PLEASE READ!] "java.lang.NullPointerException" Client wont load!
channel.description:
I am trying to add the new emotes tab into my 317 bluurs client and I am trying to get the sprite to load, I did something and it gave the following error, I've tried undoing what I did but it still gives me the error in the Client listener. It compiles fine but when I run it I get the error. Please help.
[code] at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:52) at client.run(client.java:39) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) Here's a picture of it: [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/dd3499f6205714e862c19b2956b345a45g.jpg[/img]
I've tried everything already so please guide me in attempting to fix this... I know no one will spoon feed but maybe you might be able to help? Thanks anyway! :P
Ghostly150

item.title: [PLEASE READ!] "java.lang.NullPointerException" Client wont load!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I am trying to add the new emotes tab into my 317 bluurs client and I am trying to get the sprite to load, I did something and it gave the following error, I’ve tried undoing what I did but it still gives me the error in the Client listener. It compiles fine but when I run it I get the error. Please help.
